item.title: Configuring Conditional Forwarding from On-Premise Domain Controller DNS with Azure DNS Private Resolver and AKS
item.description: Table of contents Create VNet Deploy AKS Create Azure private DNS zone Deploy NGINX ingress controller Deploy External DNS Deploy Sample Appplication Deploy and configure Azure DNS private resolver Configure conditional forwarding from DNS server Test if we can reach AKS service from on-premise Finall thoughts Aditional resources In this article, we will see how to resolve names of the K8s services running in AKS (Azure Kubernetes Service) from an on-premise desktop or server which is using DNS server running as part Active Directory Domain Controller.
